<S%G3778><s%> And This <S%G1161><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Judgment, <S%G2920><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> Has Come <S%G2064><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light; <S%G5457><s%> <S%G2258><s%> For Were <S%G1063><s%> Evil <S%G4190><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Works. <S%G2041><s%>
